info.name: UESP Dark-Gold by dahomej superior
info.description: I've mostly tested it for Morrowind pages. There's a lot of elements with inline styles and no class on UESP so I definitely didn't include them all - feel free to edit this on your own. Either let me know about your updates by posting here or sending an email to wolnyman123@wp.pl, or publish a fork of this style. You may also be interested in UESP Narrow
